question:
Add the following 5 steps to the animation "example":

    0% - Set background color to "purple", left position to "0px", top position to: "0px"
    25% - Set background color to "blue", left position to "0px", top position to: "200px"
    50% - Set background color to "purple", left position to "200px", top position to: "200px"
    75% - Set background color to "blue", left position to "200px", top position to: "0px"
    100% - Set background color to "purple", left position to "0px", top position to: "0px".
hint: Hint: The % values represents the different stages of the animation. 0% is the start, and 100% is the end.
start_part:
<head>
    <style>
     div {
      width: 180px;
      height: 180px;
      position: relative;
      background-color: black;
      animation-name: example;
      animation-duration: 4s;
    }

    @keyframes example {
